00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : PostStream
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00014

00030 
00031  SUBROUTINE PostStream
00032 
00033 ! Common Variables
00034  USE NTypes,    ONLY : DBL
00035  USE Domain,    ONLY : inv12, ni, xl, xu, yl, yu
00036  USE FluidParams
00037  USE LBMParams
00038  IMPLICIT NONE
00039 
00040 ! Local Variables
00041  INTEGER :: i, j, ie, iw, jn, js
00042  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: Ff, Fg, GX, GY, UG, ux, uy, U_sq, v
00043  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: rhon, tau, invTau, invTau2, invCsRho
00044  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: gradPsiX, gradPsiY, gradRhoSqX, gradRhoSqY
00045  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: gradRhoXX2, gradRhoXY2, gradRhoYX2, gradRhoYY2
00046  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: gradRhoU, gradPsiU, gradRhoPsi
00047  REAL(KIND = DBL), DIMENSION(0:8) :: feq, geq, Gam, GamW
00048  REAL(KIND = DBL), DIMENSION(1:8) :: gradPsiD, gradRhoD
00049 
00050  DO j = yl, yu
00051    DO i = xl, xu
00052 
00053 ! Define some local values
00054      rhon = rho(i,j)
00055      ux   = u(i,j,1)
00056      uy   = u(i,j,2)
00057      U_sq = 0.5D0*( ux*ux + uy*uy )
00058      tau  = tauL + (rhon - rhoL)*tauRhoStar
00059      invTau   = 1.D0/(1.D0 + 2.D0*tau)
00060      invTau2  = tau*invTau
00061      invCsRho = invCs_sq*rhon
00062 
00063 ! Identify neighboring cells
00064      ie = ni(i,j,1)
00065      jn = ni(i,j,2)
00066      iw = ni(i,j,3)
00067      js = ni(i,j,4)
00068 
00069 !--------- Standard Derivatives (1/12 factor embedded in kappa_12) -------------
00070 ! Gradient of the chemical potential psi
00071      gradPsiX = ( 4.D0*( psi(ie,j ) - psi(iw,j ) ) + psi(ie,jn) - psi(iw,js) &
00072               + psi(ie,js) - psi(iw,jn) )*inv12
00073 
00074      gradPsiY = ( 4.D0*( psi(i ,jn) - psi(i ,js) ) + psi(ie,jn) - psi(iw,js) &
00075               + psi(iw,jn) - psi(ie,js) )*inv12
00076 
00077 ! Gradient of the square of the density gradient
00078      gradRhoSqX = 4.D0*( gradRhoSq(ie,j ) - gradRhoSq(iw,j ) ) &
00079                 + gradRhoSq(ie,jn) - gradRhoSq(iw,js)          &
00080                 + gradRhoSq(ie,js)- gradRhoSq(iw,jn)
00081 
00082      gradRhoSqY = 4.D0*( gradRhoSq(i ,jn) - gradRhoSq(i ,js) ) &
00083                 + gradRhoSq(ie,jn) - gradRhoSq(iw,js)          &
00084                 + gradRhoSq(iw,jn) - gradRhoSq(ie,js)
00085 
00086 ! Second derivatives of rho
00087      gradRhoXX2 = 4.D0*( gradRhoXX(ie,j ) - gradRhoXX(iw,j ) ) &
00088                 + gradRhoXX(ie,jn) - gradRhoXX(iw,js)          &
00089                 + gradRhoXX(ie,js) - gradRhoXX(iw,jn)
00090 
00091      gradRhoXY2 = 4.D0*( gradRhoXY(i ,jn) - gradRhoXY(i ,js) ) &
00092                 + gradRhoXY(ie,jn) - gradRhoXY(iw,js)          &
00093                 + gradRhoXY(iw,jn) - gradRhoXY(ie,js)
00094 
00095      gradRhoYX2 = 4.D0*( gradRhoXY(ie,j ) - gradRhoXY(iw,j ) ) &
00096                 + gradRhoXY(ie,jn) - gradRhoXY(iw,js)          &
00097                 + gradRhoXY(ie,js) - gradRhoXY(iw,jn)
00098 
00099      gradRhoYY2 = 4.D0*( gradRhoYY(i ,jn) - gradRhoYY(i ,js) ) &
00100                 + gradRhoYY(ie,jn) - gradRhoYY(iw,js)          &
00101                 + gradRhoYY(iw,jn) - gradRhoYY(ie,js)
00102 
00103 !--------- Directional derivatives (2nd Order Centered Differencing Scheme) ----
00104 ! Gradient of the density rho
00105      gradRhoD(1) = 0.5D0*( rho(ie,j)  - rho(iw,j) )
00106      gradRhoD(2) = 0.5D0*( rho(i,jn)  - rho(i,js) )
00107      gradRhoD(3) = 0.5D0*( rho(iw,j)  - rho(ie,j) )
00108      gradRhoD(4) = 0.5D0*( rho(i,js)  - rho(i,jn) )
00109      gradRhoD(5) = 0.5D0*( rho(ie,jn) - rho(iw,js) )
00110      gradRhoD(6) = 0.5D0*( rho(iw,jn) - rho(ie,js) )
00111      gradRhoD(7) = 0.5D0*( rho(iw,js) - rho(ie,jn) )
00112      gradRhoD(8) = 0.5D0*( rho(ie,js) - rho(iw,jn) )
00113 
00114 ! Gradient of the chemical potential psi
00115      gradPsiD(1) = 0.5D0*( psi(ie,j)  - psi(iw,j) )
00116      gradPsiD(2) = 0.5D0*( psi(i,jn)  - psi(i,js) )
00117      gradPsiD(3) = 0.5D0*( psi(iw,j)  - psi(ie,j) )
00118      gradPsiD(4) = 0.5D0*( psi(i,js)  - psi(i,jn) )
00119      gradPsiD(5) = 0.5D0*( psi(ie,jn) - psi(iw,js) )
00120      gradPsiD(6) = 0.5D0*( psi(iw,jn) - psi(ie,js) )
00121      gradPsiD(7) = 0.5D0*( psi(iw,js) - psi(ie,jn) )
00122      gradPsiD(8) = 0.5D0*( psi(ie,js) - psi(iw,jn) )
00123 
00124 !--------- Equilibrium values of Gamma, and the distribution functions ---------
00125      GamW(0) = W0C*U_sq
00126      Gam(0)  = W0 - GamW(0)
00127      feq(0)  = Gam(0)*rhon
00128      geq(0)  = W0C*p(i,j) - rhon*GamW(0)
00129 
00130      GamW(1) = W1C*(ux + 1.5D0*ux*ux - U_sq )
00131      Gam(1)  = W1 + GamW(1)
00132      feq(1)  = Gam(1)*rhon
00133      geq(1)  = W1C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(1)
00134 
00135      GamW(2) = W1C*( uy + 1.5D0*uy*uy - U_sq )
00136      Gam(2)  = W1 + GamW(2)
00137      feq(2)  = Gam(2)*rhon
00138      geq(2)  = W1C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(2)
00139 
00140      GamW(3) = W1C*( -ux + 1.5D0*ux*ux - U_sq )
00141      Gam(3)  = W1 + GamW(3)
00142      feq(3)  = Gam(3)*rhon
00143      geq(3)  = W1C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(3)
00144 
00145      GamW(4) = W1C*( -uy + 1.5D0*uy*uy - U_sq )
00146      Gam(4)  = W1 + GamW(4)
00147      feq(4)  = Gam(4)*rhon
00148      geq(4)  = W1C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(4)
00149 
00150      v       = ux + uy
00151      GamW(5) = W2C*( v + 1.5D0*v*v - U_sq )
00152      Gam(5)  = W2 + GamW(5)
00153      feq(5)  = Gam(5)*rhon
00154      geq(5)  = W2C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(5)
00155 
00156      v      = -ux + uy
00157      GamW(6) = W2C*( v + 1.5D0*v*v - U_sq )
00158      Gam(6)  = W2 + GamW(6)
00159      feq(6)  = Gam(6)*rhon
00160      geq(6)  = W2C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(6)
00161 
00162      v       = -ux - uy
00163      GamW(7) = W2C*( v + 1.5D0*v*v - U_sq )
00164      Gam(7)  = W2 + GamW(7)
00165      feq(7)  = Gam(7)*rhon
00166      geq(7)  = W2C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(7)
00167 
00168      v       = ux - uy
00169      GamW(8) = W2C*( v + 1.5D0*v*v - U_sq )
00170      Gam(8)  = W2 + GamW(8)
00171      feq(8)  = Gam(8)*rhon
00172      geq(8)  = W2C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(8)
00173 
00174 ! Define directional terms that are common to all (f,g) components
00175      gradRhoU = ux*gradRhoX(i,j) + uy*gradRhoY(i,j)
00176      gradPsiU = ux*gradPsiX      + uy*gradPsiY
00177      gradRhoPsi = gradRhoU - invCsRho*gradPsiU
00178      GX = kappa_12*( gradRhoSqX - gradRhoXX2 - gradRhoXY2 )
00179      GY = kappa_12*( gradRhoSqY - gradRhoYX2 - gradRhoYY2 )
00180      UG = ux*GX + uy*GY
00181 
00182 !--------- Collision and stream for the f and g distribution functions ---------
00183      Ff = Gam(0)*gradRhoPsi
00184      Fg = GamW(0)*gradRhoU + invCs_sq*Gam(0)*UG
00185      f(i,j,0) = fbar(i,j,0) + invTau*( feq(0) - fbar(i,j,0) ) - invTau2*Ff
00186      g(i,j,0) = gbar(i,j,0) + invTau*( geq(0) - gbar(i,j,0) ) - invTau2*Fg
00187 
00188 ! Direction 1
00189      Ff = Gam(1)*( gradRhoD(1) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(1) - gradRhoPsi )
00190      Fg = GamW(1)*( gradRhoD(1) - gradRhoU ) + invCs_sq*Gam(1)*( GX - UG )
00191      f(i,j,1) = fbar(i,j,1) + invTau*( feq(1) - fbar(i,j,1) ) + invTau2*Ff
00192      g(i,j,1) = gbar(i,j,1) + invTau*( geq(1) - gbar(i,j,1) ) + invTau2*Fg
00193 
00194 ! Direction 2
00195      Ff = Gam(2)*( gradRhoD(2) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(2) - gradRhoPsi )
00196      Fg = GamW(2)*( gradRhoD(2) - gradRhoU ) + invCs_sq*Gam(2)*( GY - UG )
00197      f(i,j,2) = fbar(i,j,2) + invTau*( feq(2) - fbar(i,j,2) ) + invTau2*Ff
00198      g(i,j,2) = gbar(i,j,2) + invTau*( geq(2) - gbar(i,j,2) ) + invTau2*Fg
00199 
00200 ! Direction 3
00201      Ff = Gam(3)*( gradRhoD(3) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(3) - gradRhoPsi )
00202      Fg = GamW(3)*( gradRhoD(3) - gradRhoU ) - invCs_sq*Gam(3)*( GX + UG )
00203      f(i,j,3) = fbar(i,j,3) + invTau*( feq(3) - fbar(i,j,3) ) + invTau2*Ff
00204      g(i,j,3) = gbar(i,j,3) + invTau*( geq(3) - gbar(i,j,3) ) + invTau2*Fg
00205 
00206 ! Direction 4
00207      Ff = Gam(4)*( gradRhoD(4) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(4) - gradRhoPsi )
00208      Fg = GamW(4)*( gradRhoD(4) - gradRhoU ) - invCs_sq*Gam(4)*( GY + UG )
00209      f(i,j,4) = fbar(i,j,4) + invTau*( feq(4) - fbar(i,j,4) ) + invTau2*Ff
00210      g(i,j,4) = gbar(i,j,4) + invTau*( geq(4) - gbar(i,j,4) ) + invTau2*Fg
00211 
00212 ! Direction 5
00213      Ff = Gam(5)*( gradRhoD(5) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(5) - gradRhoPsi )
00214      Fg = GamW(5)*( gradRhoD(5) - gradRhoU ) + invCs_sq*Gam(5)*( GX + GY - UG )
00215      f(i,j,5) = fbar(i,j,5) + invTau*( feq(5) - fbar(i,j,5) ) + invTau2*Ff
00216      g(i,j,5) = gbar(i,j,5) + invTau*( geq(5) - gbar(i,j,5) ) + invTau2*Fg
00217 
00218 ! Direction 6
00219      Ff = Gam(6)*( gradRhoD(6) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(6) - gradRhoPsi )
00220      Fg = GamW(6)*( gradRhoD(6) - gradRhoU ) - invCs_sq*Gam(6)*( GX - GY + UG )
00221      f(i,j,6) = fbar(i,j,6) + invTau*( feq(6) - fbar(i,j,6) ) + invTau2*Ff
00222      g(i,j,6) = gbar(i,j,6) + invTau*( geq(6) - gbar(i,j,6) ) + invTau2*Fg
00223 
00224 ! Direction 7
00225      Ff = Gam(7)*( gradRhoD(7) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(7) - gradRhoPsi )
00226      Fg = GamW(7)*( gradRhoD(7) - gradRhoU ) - invCs_sq*Gam(7)*( GX + GY + UG )
00227      f(i,j,7) = fbar(i,j,7) + invTau*( feq(7) - fbar(i,j,7) ) + invTau2*Ff
00228      g(i,j,7) = gbar(i,j,7) + invTau*( geq(7) - gbar(i,j,7) ) + invTau2*Fg
00229 
00230 ! Direction 8
00231      Ff = Gam(8)*( gradRhoD(8) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(8) - gradRhoPsi )
00232      Fg = GamW(8)*( gradRhoD(8) - gradRhoU ) + invCs_sq*Gam(8)*( GX - GY - UG )
00233      f(i,j,8) = fbar(i,j,8) + invTau*( feq(8) - fbar(i,j,8) ) + invTau2*Ff
00234      g(i,j,8) = gbar(i,j,8) + invTau*( geq(8) - gbar(i,j,8) ) + invTau2*Fg
00235 
00236    END DO
00237  END DO
00238 
00239  RETURN
00240  END SUBROUTINE PostStream
Generated on Mon Nov 10 16:42:25 2008 for LL-2D-STD-MPI by  1.5.6
